doc.name: OntologyMoMLHandler
doc.description: This is an attribute used by the OntologySolver to issue MoML requests and make changes to the model. These changes include addition, update, or deletion of concept annotations and display of the concept results. This is designed to be contained by an instance of OntologySolver or a subclass of OntologySolver. It contains parameters that allow users to configure the display of the concept annotation results.
doc.author: Ben Lickly, Man-Kit Leung
